morningBrief.headline: Fewer Crowds, More Turns
morningBrief.body: 116 trails open, 64 groomed. Cloudy, temperatures TBD. Light snow possible in the forecast.

morningBrief.headline: The Forecast Looks Promising
morningBrief.body: 112/142 trails spinning, 55 freshly groomed. Windy. Keep an eye on the sky - a refresh is coming. A few inches on the way.

morningBrief.headline: More Snow Coming
morningBrief.body: Steady snowfall with 7" over the last week. The whole mountain is basically open. Go explore. Snow is in the cards for the next few days. Enough to freshen things up.

morningBrief.headline: Midweek Bliss
morningBrief.body: Steady snowfall with 6" over the last week. Peak terrain status: almost everything is available today.

morningBrief.headline: Winter's Coming Back
morningBrief.body: 147/176 trails spinning, 56 freshly groomed. Windy. Winter has more to say. 6" forecasted means conditions improving soon.

morningBrief.headline: Major System Approaching
morningBrief.body: 132 of 144 trails are open with 79 groomed. Windy with a temperatures TBD. A significant storm is brewing with 6" expected over the next few days.

morningBrief.headline: Big Snow Incoming
morningBrief.body: 85/85 trails spinning, 69 freshly groomed. Mostly Cloudy. The whole mountain is basically open. Go explore. Storm cycle alert! 8" on the way. Conditions are about to level up.

morningBrief.headline: Major System Approaching
morningBrief.body: The rundown: 174 trails open, 95 groomed. Windy with temps around temps TBD. The weather models are locked in: 10" of snow heading our way.

morningBrief.headline: Overnight Refresh
morningBrief.body: The mountain got a nice 1.2" touch-up. Expect improved conditions. Nearly full mountain access with 116 of 120 trails spinning.

morningBrief.headline: Transition Day
morningBrief.body: 166 of 170 trails are open with 32 groomed. Cloud/Sun/Mixed with a high of 32F. Nearly full mountain access with 166 of 170 trails spinning. Mixed precipitation expected. Rain at base, snow up top. Dress in layers.

morningBrief.headline: Beat the Weekend Rush
morningBrief.body: 76 trails open, 31 groomed. Unknown, high of 26.6. 76/81 trails open, 31 groomed. 26.6 and Unknown.
